Posts.Content: Thanks for all the info you post ! Very inspiring posts also!! I was dxed 7/12/18 w/ a high grade t1 bc. I am finishing first course of 6 BCG treatments. I am an active 58 and had been ramping up biking last couple years although nothing compared to yours. Where can i get more info on biking with bladder cancer? I want to keep the bladder but not risk interference with treatment(s).
Posts.Title: Bucket list item done, Twin Peak South, Challis Idaho
